body_html:
I've realized that there are many small caveats which keep this as well as the existing functions from working properly.
By the way, why do these functions return paths relative to tensorflow/ instead of one level higher?

body:
I've realized that there are many small caveats which keep this as well as the existing functions from working properly.
By the way, why do these functions return paths relative to `tensorflow/` instead of one level higher?
